name: ABC Llama
description:
Welcome to ABC Llama! A fun rapid fire game for kids to learn their ABC's :)

ABC's are a cinch! Sit with your kid and encourage them to click on the button that matches the text. Make sure sound is turned on so they can hear the sound and get the applause.

Notes:

This game is under development. It is optimised for tablets and large phones - it may not work well on very small screens. Also the sound is not yet available above level 4.

Comments:

We love comments! Please drop us a line on what you like or needs improving :)
